comment: Instructor was above par of my other instructors. The class atmosphere was fun and enlightening.
This class was a blast. I am an IS&A major (Business) and I have no clue about performing arts. Easy A, great energy, and Dr. Luckett is very helpful.
So looking forward to taking another class with her next semester. She rocks and makes learning fun :)

Dr. Luckett was really engaging and entertaining. Honestly, I took Theater because I had zero interest in Art or Music but once the class was over I had a confidence that I could actually some local playhouse shows and stuff. As a devout christian, some of the material was a little inappropriate but there is not much that could be done about that.
Dr. Luckett challenged me to create my own canon and told me I was a great writer. It's good to know that there are still real teachers in the world.
Excellent instructor. I'm thinking about becoming a performance studies major.
Helping me a whole lot on my final paper. She has proofread my paper about three times. I appreciate her help and she gives great career advice.
She seems to purposely try and make this class hard. The first day she said there is no such thing as an "A" paper. She doesn't do a whole lot of teaching. Not helpful at all.

This is an easy class and you should definitely take it. She is very entertaining. The class was not well organized, and we didn't use the text book once. She is very set in what she believes, and you can't change her mind about ANYTHING. Overall I would recommend taking the class though. It isn't that bad.
Easily got a 100.7% in the class... need I say more?
It's not too hard to get an A in her class. She's cool and she seems to care about the whole student. She learned all the names in the class and it's like 90 of us.
We actually got a good grade on our final performance. I like her. She's cool, just a little mean at times.

Gives less than one minute per test question and has at times prevented going back to double check answers. The class seemingly has little to do with theatre specifically and encompasses other arts. I'd not take her class again nor would I recommend her to others.
Excellent instructor!!! I would recommend her class to anybody interested in the arts.

Interesting and makes lectures interesting but does not give enough time to complete quizzes or test. all test and quizzes are online   must go see 3 plays and write a short paper on them and final is a group project
